alert.note: Alert for Bee; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southern Victoria, southeastern Goliad, northern Refugio and east central Bee Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Goliad to 8 miles southeast of Fannin to 6 miles south of Bloomington. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Refugio, Goliad, McFaddin, Fannin, Quintana, Placedo, Bloomington, Tivoli, Blanconia and Austwell. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 642 and 668. US Highway 59 between mile markers 654 and 664. US Highway 77 between mile markers 590 and 620. US Highway 87 near mile marker 826. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
